statements: SELECT id, image_data FROM signature_images;
SELECT image_data, id FROM signature_images;
SELECT * FROM signature_images WHERE id = 1;
SELECT image_data FROM signature_images WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id FROM signature_images WHERE id > 3;
SELECT id, image_data FROM signature_images WHERE id = 1;
SELECT image_data FROM signature_images WHERE id = 2 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, image_data FROM signature_images WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, image_data FROM signature_images WHERE image_data LIKE '%signature%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT image_data FROM signature_images WHERE id > 3 AND id < 8;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, user_id FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, user_id FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT users.user_id, username, image FROM users JOIN signature_images ON users.signature_id = signature_images.id WHERE users.user_id < 10 ORDER BY users.user_id ASC;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE signature_id IS NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM users;
SELECT * FROM signatures;
SELECT id, signature FROM signatures WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, token, expiry_date FROM auth_tokens WHERE expiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS token_count FROM auth_tokens GROUP BY user_id HAVING token_count > 1;
SELECT username, password FROM users ORDER BY username DESC
SELECT * FROM auth_tokens WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT * FROM signatures LIMIT 5 OFFSET 10
SELECT user_id, COUNT(token_id) AS token_count FROM auth_tokens GROUP BY user_id HAVING token_count > 3 ORDER BY token_count DESC
SELECT user_id, token FROM auth_tokens JOIN users ON auth_tokens.user_id = users.user_id
SELECT * FROM signatures;
SELECT id, image, user_id, created_at FROM signatures;
SELECT user_id, id, image, created_at FROM signatures;
SELECT id, username, password_digest FROM users;
SELECT role_id, id, permission_name FROM permissions;
SELECT * FROM signatures WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT id, created_at FROM signatures WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT s.id, u.username FROM signatures s JOIN users u ON s.user_id = u.id WHERE u.username = 'john_doe' ORDER BY s.created_at ASC;
SELECT p.permission_name, r.role_name FROM permissions p JOIN roles r ON p.role_id = r.id WHERE r.role_name = 'admin';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_signatures FROM signatures;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT u.username, s.signature_id FROM users u JOIN user_signatures s ON u.user_id = s.user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_sessions WHERE logout_time IS NULL;
SELECT log_id, user_id, log_message, log_time FROM user_logs ORDER BY log_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, login_time FROM user_sessions ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT users.username, user_signatures.signature_id FROM users JOIN user_signatures ON users.user_id = user_signatures.user_id;
SELECT users.username, user_logs.log_message FROM users JOIN user_logs ON users.user_id = user_logs.user_id WHERE user_logs.log_time > '2021-10-01';
